short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takes a url from iMDb and sparses it to a Trakt TV Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be used to take you from a website like iMDb or Netflix and bring you over to the same movie title search in Trakt.TV

I use this to check if movies are in my collection or have been seen. Then I use another app that I created called Netflix Search to add movies to my cue.
